/* collab.report.getUserTaskDayList */
SELECT a.TaskSeq as "TaskSeq" , a.PrjDesc as "PrjDesc" , a.TaskName as "TaskName" , a.TaskStatus as "TaskStatus" , a.ProgRate as "ProgRate" , a.Remark as "Remark" , PrjCount as "PrjCount" FROM ( SELECT ct.TaskSeq , ct.TaskName , ct.TaskStatus , ct.ProgRate , ct.Remark , (SELECT m.prjType||'^'||case when m.prjType='P' then cp.PrjName else Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sg.MultiDisplayName) end ||'^'|| TaskSeq ||'^'|| SectionName FROM collab_task_map m JOIN collab_section s on m.sectionSeq = s.sectionseq LEFT JOIN collab_project cp on m.PrjType = 'P' and cp.PrjSeq = m.PrjSeq LEFT JOIN sys_object_group sg on m.PrjType != 'P' and sg.GroupID = m.PrjSeq WHERE TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq AND ROWNUM = 1 ) as PrjDesc , (SELECT count(*) FROM collab_task_map WHERE TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq) as PrjCount FROM COLLAB_TASK ct INNER JOIN COLLAB_TASK_MEMBER ctmember on ctmember.UserCode = #{USERID} and ctmember.TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq LEFT JOIN COLLAB_REPORT_DAY rd on rd.ReporterCode =ctmember.UserCode and rd.ReportDate = #{reportDate} and ct.TaskSeq = rd.taskSeq WHERE rd.taskSeq is null AND ct.ParentKey = 0 AND (ct.TaskStatus != 'C' OR (#{reportDate} <= ct.CloseDate and ct.TaskStatus = 'C')) ) a WHERE PrjCount >0 ORDER BY PrjDesc, a.TaskSeq

/* collab.report.getUserTaskDayListCnt */
SELECT NVL(COUNT(1),0) CNT FROM (SELECT ct.TaskSeq , ct.TaskName , ct.TaskStatus , ct.ProgRate , ct.Remark , (SELECT count(*) FROM collab_task_map WHERE TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq) as PrjCount FROM COLLAB_TASK ct INNER JOIN COLLAB_TASK_MEMBER ctmember on ctmember.UserCode = #{USERID} and ctmember.TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq LEFT JOIN COLLAB_REPORT_DAY rd on rd.ReporterCode =ctmember.UserCode and rd.ReportDate = #{reportDate} and ct.TaskSeq = rd.taskSeq WHERE rd.taskSeq is null AND ct.ParentKey = 0 AND (ct.TaskStatus != 'C' OR (#{reportDate} <= ct.CloseDate and ct.TaskStatus = 'C')) ) a WHERE PrjCount >0

/* collab.report.getUserCollabReportDayList */
SELECT crd.DaySeq as "DaySeq" , crd.TaskSeq as "TaskSeq" , ct.TaskName as "TaskName" , crd.TaskStatus as "TaskStatus" , crd.ProgRate as "ProgRate" , crd.TaskTime as "TaskTime" , crd.Remark as "Remark" , (SELECT m.prjType||'^'||case when m.prjType='P' then cp.PrjName else Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sg.MultiDisplayName) end ||'^'|| TaskSeq ||'^'|| SectionName FROM collab_task_map m JOIN collab_section s on m.sectionSeq = s.sectionseq LEFT JOIN collab_project cp on m.PrjType = 'P' and cp.PrjSeq = m.PrjSeq LEFT JOIN sys_object_group sg on m.PrjType != 'P' and sg.GroupID = m.PrjSeq WHERE TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq AND ROWNUM = 1 ) as "PrjDesc" , (SELECT count(*) FROM collab_task_map WHERE TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq) as "PrjCount" FROM COLLAB_REPORT_DAY crd INNER JOIN COLLAB_TASK ct on ct.TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq WHERE crd.ReporterCode = #{USERID} AND crd.ReportDate = #{reportDate} ORDER BY "PrjDesc", crd.TaskSeq

/* collab.report.getUserCollabReportDay */ SELECT crd.DaySeq as "DaySeq" , TO_DATE(crd.ReportDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "ReportDate" , crd.TaskSeq as "TaskSeq" , ct.TaskName as "TaskName" , crd.TaskStatus as "TaskStatus" , crd.ProgRate as "ProgRate" , crd.TaskTime as "TaskTime" , crd.Remark as "Remark" , (SELECT m.prjType||'^'||case when m.prjType='P' then cp.PrjName else Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sg.MultiDisplayName) end ||'^'|| TaskSeq ||'^'|| SectionName FROM collab_task_map m JOIN collab_section s on m.sectionSeq = s.sectionseq LEFT JOIN collab_project cp on m.PrjType = 'P' and cp.PrjSeq = m.PrjSeq LEFT JOIN sys_object_group sg on m.PrjType != 'P' and sg.GroupID = m.PrjSeq WHERE TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq AND ROWNUM = 1 ) as "PrjDesc" , (SELECT count(*) FROM collab_task_map WHERE TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq) as "PrjCount" FROM COLLAB_REPORT_DAY crd INNER JOIN COLLAB_TASK ct on ct.TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq WHERE crd.DaySeq = #{daySeq}

/* collab.report.getUserCollabReportWeekProjectList */ SELECT DISTINCT ctmap.PrjSeq as "PrjSeq" , ctmap.PrjType as "PrjType" , cp.PrjName as "PrjName" FROM COLLAB_REPORT_DAY crd INNER JOIN COLLAB_TASK ct on ct.TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq INNER JOIN COLLAB_TASK_MAP ctmap on ctmap.TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq INNER JOIN collab_project cp on ctmap.PrjType = 'P' and cp.PrjSeq = ctmap.PrjSeq WHERE crd.ReporterCode = #{USERID} and crd.ReportDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and ctmap.PrjType is not null UNION ALL SELECT b.GROUPID AS "PrjSeq" ,'T'||c.EXECYEAR AS "PrjType" ,FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S('', MULTIDEPTNAME) AS "PrjName" FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP a JOIN SYS_OBJECT_GROUP b ON a.DEPTCODE = b.GROUPCODE and b.GroupType='Dept' JOIN COLLAB_TEAM_EXEC c on b.groupid = c.groupid AND c.isClose='N' WHERE USERCODE = #{USERID} AND b.IsUse='Y' AND b.IsDisplay ='Y'

/* collab.report.getProjectReportDayList */ SELECT crd.DaySeq as "DaySeq" , ct.TaskName as "TaskName" , crd.TaskTime as "TaskTime" , crd.ProgRate as "ProgRate" , crd.Remark as "Remark" , crd.TaskStatus as "TaskStatus" , crd.ReportDate as "ReportDate" , crd.TaskSeq as "TaskSeq" , s.SectionName as "SectionName" FROM COLLAB_REPORT_DAY crd INNER JOIN COLLAB_TASK ct on ct.TaskSeq = crd.TaskSeq INNER JOIN COLLAB_TASK_MAP ctmap on ctmap.PrjType = #{prjType} AND ctmap.PrjSeq =#{prjSeq} and ctmap.TaskSeq = ct.TaskSeq INNER JOIN COLLAB_section s on ctmap.SectionSeq = s.sectionSeq WHERE crd.ReportDate BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} AND crd.ReporterCode = #{reporterCode} ORDER BY crd.ReportDate

/* collab.report.getProjectReportWeekList */ SELECT sou.UserCode as "UserCode" , sou.MultiDisplayName as "MultiDisplayName" , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},sou.MultiDisplayName) as "UserName" , cr.ReportSeq as "ReportSeq" , cr.WeekRemark as "WeekRemark" , cr.NextPlan as "NextPlan" , cr.StartDate as "StartDate" , cr.EndDate as "EndDate" , cr.ReporterCode as "ReporterCode" , cr.PrjType as "PrjType" , cr.PrjSeq as "PrjSeq" , soub.JobPositionSortKey as "JobPositionSortKey" FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER sou
JOIN SYS_OBJECT_GROUP sb ON sb.GroupID = #{prjSeq} JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP soub ON sb.GroupCode = soub.DeptCode AND sou.UserCode = soub.UserCode
JOIN COLLAB_PROJECT cp on cp.PrjSeq = #{prjSeq} JOIN COLLAB_PROJECT_MEMBER cpm on cp.PrjSeq = cpm.PrjSeq and sou.UserCode = cpm.UserCode JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP soub ON soub.JobType='Origin' AND sou.UserCode = soub.UserCode
LEFT JOIN COLLAB_REPORT cr ON sou.UserCode = cr.ReporterCode AND cr.PrjType = #{prjType} AND cr.PrjSeq= #{prjSeq} AND cr.StartDate = #{startDate} AND cr.EndDate = #{endDate} WHERE sou.IsUse = 'Y' AND sou.IsDisplay = 'Y' ORDER BY "UserName", soub.JobPositionSortKey
